content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f608 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e baby beenz textured blankie size 21 x 24 materials 2 100g balls of baby beenz- shown in color 80 needles 24 circular size 9 5 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge gauge approx 4 sts =1 over stockinette garter st knit every st every row loosely cast on 84 sts work in garter st pattern for 8 row begin textured bricks pattern as follows row 1 rs knit row 2 k5 p1 k2 * p3 k2 repeat from * to last 6 sts end p1 k5 row 3 knit row 4 k5 p1 k2 * p3 k2 repeat from * to last 6 sts end p1 k5 row 5 knit row 6 knit repeat row 1 6 until total length is about 23 ending with a row 6 work in garter stitch for 8 row bind off loosely weave in all ends ©2014 plymouth yarn company 080514jbt abbreviations k = knit p = purl st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side
